name: Launcher

screenshots.caption: Search for differences in feature values between two corpora
Investigate the words most similar to a given target word.
Search for words most similar to a given target word.

short_description: Launcher allows users to build and inspect semantic spaces. It supports the retrieval of the words most similar to a target, in the same or a different corpus, and the discovery of its typical collocates.
